data.text: My deam is――that "rainbow".
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>My deam is――that "rainbow".

data.text:
Further beyond the strongest. To reach the end of 
that rainbow. And what's at the end of that rainbow――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Further beyond the strongest. To reach the end of 
<story>that rainbow. And what's at the end of that rainbow――

data.text:
――France. The place my parents met. 
And the country my dad is currently active in.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>――France. The place my parents met. 
<story>And the country my dad is currently active in.

data.text:
That's the place I want to reach the top at. 
Right, just like my dad.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>That's the place I want to reach the top at. 
<story>Right, just like my dad.

data.text:
Dad. Why are you trying to make the top brand? 
If you didn't have work, then we could spend more time together.
data.name: Young Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Dad. Why are you trying to make the top brand? 
<story>If you didn't have work, then we could spend more time together.

data.text:
Laurel. Well, that's……because only those 
at the top can shine the brightest.
data.name: Laurel's Father
data.processed:
<story>Laurel. Well, that's……because only those 
<story>at the top can shine the brightest.

data.text:
To make everyone the happiest, proudest, and bring 
the most joy, you can't be anything but the best.
data.name: Laurel's Father
data.processed:
<story>To make everyone the happiest, proudest, and bring 
<story>the most joy, you can't be anything but the best.

data.text:
There are many people in the world. What the one at the top is 
able to accomplish can determine just how happy everyone can become.
data.name: Laurel's Father
data.processed:
<story>There are many people in the world. What the one at the top is 
<story>able to accomplish can determine just how happy everyone can become.

data.text:
That's why I can't stop. I want to improve my designs and 
operate in more countries and build the greatest brand.
data.name: Laurel's Father
data.processed:
<story>That's why I can't stop. I want to improve my designs and 
<story>operate in more countries and build the greatest brand.

data.text:
Just like our brand's icon, the rainbow. 
Huge, and filled with colors.
data.name: Laurel's Father
data.processed:
<story>Just like our brand's icon, the rainbow. 
<story>Huge, and filled with colors.

data.text:
I am--an Uma Musume. And for Uma Musume, 
the pinnacle of Uma Musume. There's the greatest race.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I am--an Uma Musume. And for Uma Musume, 
<story>the pinnacle of Uma Musume. There's the greatest race.

data.text:
And I want to win there. No, I don't want to just win, 
I want to win in the greatest way possible.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>And I want to win there. No, I don't want to just win, 
<story>I want to win in the greatest way possible.

data.text:
That's my dream. And everyone's happiness. 
The place my dad is aiming for, and that I am too――the sky.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>That's my dream. And everyone's happiness. 
<story>The place my dad is aiming for, and that I am too――the sky.

data.text:
One that everyone knows about and aspires to. 
Held west of Paris along the Seine river. A race 
course said to be the most beautiful in the world……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>One that everyone knows about and aspires to. 
<story>Held west of Paris along the Seine river. A race 
<story>course said to be the most beautiful in the world……

data.text:
And in the entire history of Tracen Academy, 
nobody has won. What could truly be called the 
greatest international G1. Its name is――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>And in the entire history of Tracen Academy, 
<story>nobody has won. What could truly be called the 
<story>greatest international G1. Its name is――

data.text: The Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>The Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe.

data.text:
『Legs of Glass』…… 
The impression of her being weak disappeared.
data.processed:
<story>『Legs of Glass』…… 
<story>The impression of her being weak disappeared.

data.text:
This Uma Musume, Sakura Laurel, 
had no intention of settling for a lesser dream……
data.processed:
<story>This Uma Musume, Sakura Laurel, 
<story>had no intention of settling for a lesser dream……

data.text:
She was aiming to 『Fulfill』 the biggest dream. With a strong desire 
to show 『I can fulfill it』. Straight-forwardly chasing after it.
data.processed:
<story>She was aiming to 『Fulfill』 the biggest dream. With a strong desire 
<story>to show 『I can fulfill it』. Straight-forwardly chasing after it.

data.text:
……Seeing that desire drew me to her. 
And before I realized it――I said aloud.

choices.text: I want to see that dream……together

data.processed:
<story>……Seeing that desire drew me to her. 
<story>And before I realized it――I said aloud.

data.text: ……? Trainer-san?
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: I want to fulfill that dream together!

data.processed: <story>……? Trainer-san?

data.text: Ah……Thank you very much! But……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Ah……Thank you very much! But……

data.text:
If you really feel that way, it'll be a while…… 
would you be willing to wait several seasons for that?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>If you really feel that way, it'll be a while…… 
<story>would you be willing to wait several seasons for that?

data.text:
Yes. My dream won't change. 
But, as you've already seen……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Yes. My dream won't change. 
<story>But, as you've already seen……

data.text:
How was it Brian? The match ended up as a victory for me but, 
was there any other Uma Musume who caught your eye?
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>How was it Brian? The match ended up as a victory for me but, 
<story>was there any other Uma Musume who caught your eye?

data.text: ……No. There was noone like that.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>……No. There was noone like that.

data.text: I can't really run! Well――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>I can't really run! Well――

data.text: There isn't anyone like that. Well――
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>There isn't anyone like that. Well――

data.text:
――At least, not yet! 
――At least, not yet.
data.name: Laurel & Brian
data.processed:
<story>――At least, not yet! 
<story>――At least, not yet.

data.text:
Spring hadn't arrived yet. 
It would be a while, but eventually Spring would arrive.
data.processed:
<story>Spring hadn't arrived yet. 
<story>It would be a while, but eventually Spring would arrive.

data.text: And time passed――
data.processed: <story>And time passed――

data.text:
Have you heard, Bakushin O-san? 
Laurel-san turned down another offer from a famous trainer.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Have you heard, Bakushin O-san? 
<story>Laurel-san turned down another offer from a famous trainer.

data.text:
Oooh, is that so……!? But, I'm pretty sure her 
condition has improved quite a lot since then.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Oooh, is that so……!? But, I'm pretty sure her 
<story>condition has improved quite a lot since then.

data.text:
The second time I met that Uma Musume was―― 
Under rows of cherry blossoms in full bloom.
data.processed:
<story>The second time I met that Uma Musume was―― 
<story>Under rows of cherry blossoms in full bloom.

data.text:
……Hello, Trainer-san. 
We're always under your care.
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: Do you have a trainer yet?
Do you have a trainer yet?

data.processed:
<story>……Hello, Trainer-san. 
<story>We're always under your care.

data.text:
No, not yet. 
I was thinking of recruiting one right about now.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>No, not yet. 
<story>I was thinking of recruiting one right about now.

data.text: In that case――

choices.text: Will you form a contract with me?
Will you form a contract with me?

data.processed: <story>In that case――

data.text: Contract……?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Contract……?

data.text: ……Muuu, I refuse.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>……Muuu, I refuse.

data.text:
Calling it a contract……don't you think that's kind of distant? 
Isn't there a more fitting thing for us?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Calling it a contract……don't you think that's kind of distant? 
<story>Isn't there a more fitting thing for us?

data.text:
Just think back. 
On that day, the words we exchanged.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Just think back. 
<story>On that day, the words we exchanged.

data.text:
……That's right. 
Those words from that day, once more…….

choices.text: I want to fulfill that dream together!
I want to fulfill that dream together!

data.processed:
<story>……That's right. 
<story>Those words from that day, once more…….

data.text:
……Yes. I'm looking forward to it! 
I'm sorry for making you wait, Trainer-san♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>……Yes. I'm looking forward to it! 
<story>I'm sorry for making you wait, Trainer-san♪

data.text:
That day, under the cherry blossoms in full bloom, 
Sakura Laurel and I didn't make a "contract"……
data.processed:
<story>That day, under the cherry blossoms in full bloom, 
<story>Sakura Laurel and I didn't make a "contract"……

data.text: We vowed to make that dream come true, together.
data.processed: <story>We vowed to make that dream come true, together.
